name: Wizardry Nemesis: The Wizardry Adventure
overview: Wizardry Nemesis (ウィザードリィ ネメシス), also known as Nemesis: The Wizardry Adventure is a spin-off of the long-running Wizardry RPG franchise. Nemesis is an adventure game which heavily relies on pre-rendered CGI, similar in nature to Myst, and aside from its title, has very little to do with the RPGs in the series. The Saturn version of the game stands as the only console port, and was only released in Japan. The spoken dialogue however is still in English.
